column5: I want to watch all the James Bond movies, since I haven't seen any of them. February is coming up. There are 26 films. February has 28 days. Close enough, one each day, and the last two days... I don't know, I'll figure something out. EDIT: Well, February was a lot more busy than I expected, and I didn't end up finishing this until March 10. Oh well. Anyway, here's my ranking of all the James Bond films.

column2: The Man with the Golden Gun
